organisation_name: Landestourismusverband Sachsen e.V./ Tourism Association of Saxony e. V.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Deutscher Tourismusverband e. V. 
Vereinigung der Sächsischen Wirtschaft e. V. 
Industrie- und Handelskammer Dresden
goals__remit: The Tourism Association of Saxony is the umbrella organisation of regional organised tourism boards in Saxony and tourism-related companies and associations. It aims to strengthen Saxon tourism as an economic factor. Therefore it carries out a coordinating, political and advisory function. This requires close cooperation with the government of Saxony, the parliament of Saxony, political parties and other institutions. Another task is networking with and for members of the board as well as external partners.
